channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Control Flow Guard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Control Flow Guard

item.title: CVE-2017-8716|2024-09-17T04:25:24.679Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20control%20flow%20guard
item.description: Windows Control Flow Guard in Microsoft Windows 10 Version 1703 allows an attacker to run a specially crafted application to bypass Control Flow Guard, due to the way that Control Flow Guard handles objects in memory, aka "Windows Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability".
